ConfigWindow_Header: 自动攻击设置（开源免费） v
ConfigWindow_ActionItem_Description: 在本面板中，您可以修改每个动作的使用条件。
ConfigWindow_HelpItem_Description: 在这个窗口，你可以看到所有插件内置的战斗指令。
Configwindow_HelpItem_AttackSmart: 开始智能进攻模式（自动选择目标），战斗中开启会根据条件切换攻击目标。
Configwindow_HelpItem_AttackManual: 开始手动进攻模式，需要自行选定攻击目标。
Configwindow_HelpItem_AttackCancel: 停止进攻，不用时一定要记得关闭。
Configwindow_HelpItem_HealArea: 开启一个自动使用群体治疗的窗口期。
Configwindow_HelpItem_HealSingle: 开启一个自动使用单体治疗的窗口期。
Configwindow_HelpItem_DefenseArea: 开启一个自动使用群体减伤的窗口期。
Configwindow_HelpItem_DefenseSingle: 开启一个自动使用单体减伤的窗口期。
Configwindow_HelpItem_EsunaShield: Open a window to use Esuna,tank stance actions or True North.
Configwindow_HelpItem_RaiseShirk: Open a window to use Raise or Shirk.
Configwindow_HelpItem_AntiRepulsion: Open a window to use knockback-penalty actions.
Configwindow_HelpItem_BreakProvoke: Open a window to use break-combo or provoke action.
Configwindow_Helper_EditCombo: 点击以编辑该自定义循环。
Configwindow_AttackItem_Description:
You can enable the function for each job you want and configure the setting about how to use actions.
Only player-current-job specific commands will be prompted.
Configwindow_AttackItem_LoadScript: Click to load a custom opener
Configwindow_AttackItem_ScriptFolderErro: Please set a storage path to use the custom opener properly!
Configwindow_Events_Description: In this window, you can set what macro will be trigger after using an action.
Configwindow_Params_Description: In this window, you can set the parameters about the using way of actions.
Configwindow_Params_UseOverlayWindowDesc: This window is currently used to cue the body position in advance.
Configwindow_Params_WeaponDelay: Set the random interval between GCD (seconds)
Configwindow_Params_WeaponFaster: Set the time advance of use actions
Configwindow_Params_WeaponInterval: Set the interval between abilities using
Configwindow_Params_SpecialDuration: Set the duration of special windows set by commands
Configwindow_Params_AddDotGCDCount: Set GCD advance of DOT refresh
Configwindow_Params_PoslockModifier: Set the modifier key to unlock the movement temporary
Configwindow_Params_TeachingModeColor: Prompt box color of teaching mode
Configwindow_Params_ShowLocationWrongDes: Attention: Positional anticipation is experimental, just for reference only.
Configwindow_Params_LocationWrongTextDes: How do you want to be scolded if you have a positional error ?!
Configwindow_Params_UseToast: Display attack mode changes on toast
Configwindow_Params_UseAOEWhenManual: Use AOE actions in manual mode
Configwindow_Params_OnlyGCD: Only use GCD action without abilities
Configwindow_Params_AttackSafeModeDesc: Nerver use any AOE action with single target./nBut if the number of hostile enough, AOE action will still be used.
Configwindow_Params_NoDefenceAbilityDesc: It is recommended to check this option if you are playing Raids./nPlan the heal and defense by yourself.
Configwindow_Params_AutoDefenseForTank: Auto tank defense (the timing of use is not quite accurate)
Configwindow_Params_AutoProvokeForTankDe: When a hostile is hitting the non-Tank member of party, it will automatically use the Provoke.
Configwindow_Params_RaisePlayerByCasting: Raise player by casting when swift is in cooldown
Configwindow_Params_LessMPNoRaise: Nerver raise player if MP is less than the set value
Configwindow_Params_HealthDifference: Set the HP standard deviation threshold for using AOE heal (ability & spell)
Configwindow_Params_HealthAreaAbility: Set the HP threshold for using AOE healing ability
Configwindow_Params_HealthAreafSpell: Set the HP threshold for using AOE healing spell
Configwindow_Params_HealingOfTimeSubstac: Set the HP threshold reduce with hot effect(AOE)
Configwindow_Params_HealthSingleAbility: Set the HP threshold for using single healing ability
Configwindow_Params_HealthSingleSpell: Set the HP threshold for using single healing spell
Configwindow_Params_HealingOfTimeSubstac: Set the HP threshold reduce with hot effect(single)
Configwindow_Params_HealthForDyingTank: Set the HP threshold for tank to use invincibility
Configwindow_Params_ChooseAttackMark: Priority attack targets with attack markers
Configwindow_Params_AttackMarkAOEDesc: Attention: Checking this option , AA will attack as many hostile targets as possible, while ignoring whether the attack will cover the marked target.
Configwindow_Params_FilterStopMark: Never attack targets with stop markers
Configwindow_Params_ObjectMinRadius: Set the minimum target circle threshold possessed by the attack target
Configwindow_Params_ChangeTargetForFate: Select only Fate targets in Fate
Configwindow_Params_MoveTowardsScreen: Using movement actions towards the object in the center of the screen
Configwindow_Params_MoveTowardsScreenDes: Using movement actions towards the object in the center of the screen, otherwise toward the facing object.
Configwindow_Params_RaiseBrinkofDeath: Raise player even has Brink of Death
Configwindow_Params_HostileDesc: You can set the logic of hostile target selection to allow flexibility in switching the logic of selecting hostile in battle.
Scriptwindow_AbilityRemainDesc: Use this action while how many abilities remain. Set it to zero to ignore.
Scriptwindow_ActionSetDescription: Input the actions into the box below. The higher the position, the higher the priority.
Scriptwindow_CountDownDesc: The actions need to use in the countdown.
Scriptwindow_CountDownSetDesc: Input the actions need to use in the countdown into the box below.
